Name: range
Description/Notes: The distance from the ADP head

Name: c_sound
Description/Notes: The speed of sound used in velocity calculations.

Name: temp
Description/Notes: The temperature measured by the instrument.

Name: accel
Description/Notes: The vector acceleraton of the instrument

Name: angrt
Description/Notes: The angular rotation rate of the instrument

Name: velrot
Description/Notes: The rotational motion velocity (computed from angrt).

Name: velacc
Description/Notes: The translational motion velocity (computed from accel).

Name: orientmat
Description/Notes: The instrument's orientation matrix in the earth reference frame

Name: corr
Description/Notes: correlation between the send and receive pings.

Name: tke_vec
Description/Notes: Variance of velocity components (0: uu, 1: vv, 2: ww)

Name: stress
Description/Notes: The Reynolds stress array (0: uv, 1: uw, 2: vw)

Name: sigma_Uh
Description/Notes: Standard deviation of horizontal velocity magnitude

Name: Spec
Description/Notes: A data group containing spectra of variables above.
